title: Second division football leagues in Europe ranked by revenue 2011/12
summary: This is a bar chart representing Football League in the x axis and Income (in million euros) in the y axis.
Football League Championship (England) has the highest Income (in million euros) and Segunda Division (Spain) has the lowest Income (in million euros).
There is a difference of 389.2 between the maximum Football League Championship (England) and minimum Football League Segunda Division (Spain).
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Football League in the x axis and Income (in million euros) in the y axis.
The Income (in million euros) is appeared to be the highest at Football League Championship (England) and lowest at Football League Segunda Division (Spain).
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Football League in the x axis and Income (in million euros) in the y axis.
Football League Championship (England) has the highest Income (in million euros) and Segunda Division (Spain) has the lowest Income (in million euros).
There is a difference of 389.2 between the maximum Football League Championship (England) and minimum Football League Segunda Division (Spain).
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Football League in the x axis and Income (in million euros) in the y axis.
The Income (in million euros) is highest at Football League Championship (England) and lowest at Football League Segunda Division (Spain).
The second highest Income (in million euros) is appeared to be the Football League 2. Bundesliga (Germany).
The highest Football League Championship (England) has 389.2 more Income (in million euros) than the lowest Football League Segunda Division (Spain).

The Football League Championship (England) has the highest Income (in million euros), followed by 2. Bundesliga (Germany), and Serie B (Italy). Down to the Football League Segunda Division (Spain) which is the lowest.
Considered together, the average Income (in million euros) in all 5 Football Leagues is roughly 328.46.
Summing up the values of all Football Leagues, we get total 1642.3.
